messages.message:
seeing a rather esoteric bug in job-service in crafting after pulling master:
```2025/02/07 20:11:50 ERROR jobservice/handler/job.go:166 -- [ABORTED]: Failed to create job entry in database. Error: failed to create job metadata: Error 1146 (42S02): Table 'ibdb.job_metadata' doesn't exist```
you need to run db migration(s) for your db - see instructions here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1738630726580689?thread_ts=1738629768.049839&cid=C05L87V014J)!
